server-setup.description: Basic MCP server with stdio transport and capability declaration

tool-basic.description: Simple tool with Zod input schema (echo pattern)

tool-annotations.description: Tool with readOnlyHint, destructiveHint, idempotentHint annotations

tool-output-schema.description: Tool with structured output schema for typed responses

resource-static.description: Static resource registration from files or fixed data

resource-template.description: Dynamic resource with URI template variables

prompt-args.description: Prompt with required/optional arguments and auto-completion

tool-agentic-sampling.description: Agentic tool using sampling with tools - LLM executes server tools in a loop (MCP 2025-11-25)

server-setup-tasks.description: Server setup with Tasks capability (InMemoryTaskStore, InMemoryTaskMessageQueue)

task-tool-basic.description: Task-enabled tool with multi-stage progress and cancellation (SEP-1686)

task-input-required.description: Task with input_required status, elicitation, multi-stage progress, and cancellation

tool-resource-links.description: Tool returning resource_link content blocks for deferred resolution

tool-elicitation.description: Standalone elicitation request with schema-driven form (client capability check)

tool-sampling-simple.description: Simple one-shot sampling request (client capability check)

prompt-completions.description: Prompt with context-aware argument completions using completable() helper

prompt-resource.description: Prompt with embedded resource references in messages

resource-collection.description: Collection resource returning multiple items with distinct URIs
